page.title: 10A day in Great Broughton
page.content: This morning I woke up and dressed at 07.45. I went downstairs to make breakfast. After I'd had my breakfast I cleaned my teeth and set off to school in the car at 08.45. At 09.00 the whistle was blown and we went into school. We had registration and read. At 09.30 we started English work followed by assembly. It finished at 10.30. We came in from play at 10.50 and did Maths. At 11.55 we washed our hands and went into lunch. We had fish fingers and chips. During playtime we had recorder group and some other things took us to hometime at 15.30. At home I changed for tennis and rode to the courts. I played with two of my friends for an hour from 16.00. I had tea and prepared for brownies. I left at 18.10. At home I watched television until 21.00.
